content: For #14312, I am thinking of adding a checkbox under "display settings" in the settings menu. I just want to confirm if this approach is correct or we should have something else.
Also one more thing. Should we disable the "ArrowUp" and "ArrowDown" keys (for scrolling through messages) when this behavior is selected as it pressing them is not giving pleasant results.
@Shubham Gupta I'm not sure we actually want to add a setting here. This is still just an unapproved feature request.

Yeah, in general, it's best to not claim feature requests that haven't been looked at by core team members, because a really important part of product design is taking the idea a user has and translating it into what makes sense to change in the larger contxt of the product.
Ok. I will keep that in mind for the future.
(Not a big deal, but I think it's helpful feedback for the community at large)
